statements: DELETE FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contributor_id = 123 AND contribution_amount > 1000.00
DELETE FROM contributions WHERE contributor_id = 123 AND amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM expenditures WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Company' AND purpose = 'Supplies';
DELETE FROM compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Election Campaigns';
DELETE FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donor_name = 'Alice' AND donation_amount > 10000
DELETE FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount < 5000 AND vendor_name = 'XYZ Corp'
DELETE FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe'
